name: Parting Shot

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 13, Dodge, Mobility, Point Blank Shot, Shot on the Run, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: Once per encounter, when using the withdraw action, you can make a single ranged attack at any point during your movement.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: You cannot attack when using the withdraw action.
sections.name: Normal

sections.body: Starting at 6th level, a ranger with the archery combat style may select Parting Shot as a combat style feat.
sections.name: Special

description: You are an expert skirmisher, able to rain missiles upon your enemies whether advancing or retreating.
